languages.text: "Мои извинения, {name}. Ввиду оборвавшегося сообщения между системами Простора не так просто поддерживать связь с агентами. Принять отчет и разобраться в ситуации — моя первостепенная обязанность".

traits.locale_text: "Мои извинения, {name}. Ввиду оборвавшегося сообщения между системами Коронуса не так просто поддерживать связь с агентами. Принять отчет и разобраться в ситуации — моя первостепенная обязанность".

languages.text: "My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Expanse, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."
languages.original_text: "Мои извинения, {name}. Ввиду оборвавшегося сообщения между системами Простора не так просто поддерживать связь с агентами. Принять отчет и разобраться в ситуации — моя первостепенная обязанность".

traits.locale_text: "My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in Koronus, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. To accept the report and assess the situation is my primary responsibility."

"My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in Koronus, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. To accept the report and assess the situation is my primary responsibility."

"My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Koronus, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."

"My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Koronus, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."

"My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Expanse, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."

languages.text: “我很抱歉，{name}。鉴于科罗努斯扩区各大星系的通信都已经中断，我们很难与特工保持联系。回收这份报告并评估情况，是我的主要责任。”
languages.original_text: "My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Expanse, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，{name}。鉴于科罗努斯扩区各大星系的通信都已经中断，我们很难与特工保持联系。回收这份报告并评估情况，是我的主要责任。”

languages.text: «Lo lamento, {name}. Dada la interrupción de comunicaciones entre sistemas en la Extensión, es muy difícil mantener el contacto con mis agentes. Recibir este informe y evaluar la situación es mi principal prioridad».
languages.original_text: "My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Expanse, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."

traits.locale_text: «Lo lamento, {name}. Dada la interrupción de comunicaciones entre sistemas en la Extensión, es muy difícil mantener el contacto con mis agentes. Recibir este informe y evaluar la situación es mi principal prioridad».

languages.text: 「すみません、{name}さん。エクスパンスのシステム間で通信が断絶しており、職員との連絡が維持できなくなっています。この報告を受けて状況を評価することが、最優先です」
languages.original_text: "My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Expanse, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."

traits.locale_text: 「すみません、{name}さん。エクスパンスのシステム間で通信が断絶しており、職員との連絡が維持できなくなっています。この報告を受けて状況を評価することが、最優先です」

languages.text: "Verzeiht, {name}. Nach dem Kommunikationsausfall zwischen Systemen in der Ausdehnung ist es schwierig geworden, mit Agenten Kontakt zu halten. Diesen Bericht zu erhalten und die Lage einzuschätzen, ist meine vordringliche Aufgabe."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Expanse, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, {name}. Nach dem Kommunikationsausfall zwischen Systemen in der Ausdehnung ist es schwierig geworden, mit Agenten Kontakt zu halten. Diesen Bericht zu erhalten und die Lage einzuschätzen, ist meine vordringliche Aufgabe."

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, {name}. Depuis l'interruption des communications entre les différents systèmes des Étendues, j'ai eu le plus grand mal à maintenir le contact avec mes agents. Il est de ma responsabilité principale de recevoir ce genre de rapport et d'évaluer la situation qui en découle. »
languages.original_text: "My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Expanse, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, {name}. Depuis l'interruption des communications entre les différents systèmes des Étendues, j'ai eu le plus grand mal à maintenir le contact avec mes agents. Il est de ma responsabilité principale de recevoir ce genre de rapport et d'évaluer la situation qui en découle. »

languages.text: "Üzgünüm {name}. Enginlik'teki sistemler arasındaki iletişim kopukluğu nedeniyle adamlarımla irtibatı sürdürmek güçleşti. Bu raporu almak ve durum değerlendirmesi yapmak, benim birincil sorumluluğum."
languages.original_text: "My apologies, {name}. Given the break in the communications between systems in the Expanse, it has become difficult to maintain contact with agents. Receiving this report and assessing the situation is my primary responsibility."

traits.locale_text: "Üzgünüm {name}. Enginlik'teki sistemler arasındaki iletişim kopukluğu nedeniyle adamlarımla irtibatı sürdürmek güç bir hâle geldi. Bu raporu almak ve durum değerlendirmesi yapmak benim birincil sorumluluğum."
